amendment.description: An amendment to increase funding for National Infrastructure Investments (TIGER Grants) by $1,150,000,000.

action.text: Mr. Diaz-Balart raised a point of order against the Waters, Maxine amendment (A005). Mr. Diaz-Balart stated that the amendment seeks to cause a net increase in budget authority in violation of the provisions of H. Res. 5. The Chair sustained the point of order.
Amendment (A005) offered by Ms. Waters, Maxine.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A005) offered by Ms. Waters, Maxine.
